Entry.en-US: Our leader Hamical died. His wounds from previous battles did not heal properly.
In his madness he took his own life,...or maybe he did not? We are never going to know.
Pacorus killed in battle invading Syria. He suffered a terrible defeat.
Phraates murdered his own father, Orodes, also his own son and all his brothers to strengthen his position!
Phraates was poisoned by his wife Musa, who was later also the wife of her son Phraatactes.

Mark Antony committed suicide by stabbing himself with his sword in the mistaken belief that Cleopatra had already done so.
When he found out that Cleopatra was still alive, his friends brought him to Cleopatra's monument in which she was hiding, and he died in her arms.
